imageUrl.description: Optional image to display with the label

style.description: The rendering style of the button. Allowable values are primary, danger and default.

voice.description: Content to be used for voice description of the action

datacontenttype.description: Content tpye of the data contained in the data attribute

dataschema.description: Identifies the schema that data adheres to. Incompatible changes to the schema should be reflected by a different URI.

id.description: The ID of the CloudEvents specification

requesttype.description: The value for this attribute decides how the runtime executes the event handler flows. ODA runtime will default to interrupt if the value is missing.

source.description: The resource that produced the event

specversion.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification

subject.description: Event's subject in the context of the event producer (identified by source) and/or event type

time.description: The time of the event expressed in RFC 3339 timestamp format

FormSubmissionPayload.description: Represents a Form submission message payload

footerText.description: Optional footer text displayed after the main message

globalActions.description: List of actions that may have a global context and not entirely related to the message

headerText.description: Optional header text displayed before the main message

partialSubmitField.description: The name of the field that trigger a partial form submission. Fields with autoSubmit property set to true can trigger such a form submission.

postback.description: The postback payload, which might include an action property to trigger navigation.

submittedFields.description: Key-value pairs of the submitted field values. The key is the name (ID) of the field.

actions.description: List of actions related to the message that users can interact with

footerText.description: Optional footer text displayed after the main message

globalActions.description: List of actions that may have a global context and not entirely related to the message

headerText.description: Optional header text displayed before the main message

postback.description: The postback, can either bt a string or a JSON object

voice.description: Content to be used for voice description of the message

RecognitionLocale.description: Locales in which voice recognition can be performed. BCP 47 language tag indicating the language of the voice input expected.

Settings.description: Represents the configuration fields for Web SDK instance

URI.description: [Network Configuration]: URI of the ODA instance

agentAvatar.description: [Deprecated]: URL for avatar icon shown alongside messages from a live agent

attachmentIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for share popup button icon

audioIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL of image shown with audio attachments when the audio can not be rendered

audioResponseOffIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for skill utterance turned off button icon

audioResponseOnIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for skill utterance turned on button icon

badgePosition.description: [Layout Modification]: Position of notification badge with respect to launch button

botButtonIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for widget launch button icon

botIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for avatar icon shown alongside skill messages

channel.description: [Internal]: Configure custom channel to connect to instead of the default web channel

channelId.description: [Network Configuration]: ODA web channel ID which is mapped to a skill/DA The ID can be retrieved from the channel in ODA designer UI

clearMessageIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for clear messages button icon

closeIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for minimize chat widget button icon

colors.description: [Layout Modification]: Color configuration for chat widget components

conversationBeginPosition.description: [Layout Modification]: Starting position of conversation. If set 'top', the first messages appear at top of chat widget. If set 'bottom', the first messages appear at bottom of chat widget.

customHeaderElementId.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Inject custom element in chat widget header by passing it ID attribute

defaultGreetingTimeout.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Number of seconds after which default greeting message is shown along with the typing cue

defaultWaitMessageInterval.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Number of seconds after which default wait message is shown along with the typing cue

delegate.description: [Feature Flags]: Add delegate callbacks that are called when messages are added to the conversation

deviceToken.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Device token sent to skill during initialization to enable push notifications

disablePastActions.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Configure disabling action buttons in older messages

displayActionsAsPills.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Display action buttons as pills

downloadIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for attachment download icon button

embedBottomScrollId.description: [Functionality Configuration]: ID of element to be injected as a scrollable content at bottom of chat

embedBottomStickyId.description: [Functionality Configuration]: ID of element to be injected as a pinned content at bottom of chat

embedTopScrollId.description: [Functionality Configuration]: ID of element to be injected as a scrollable content at top of chat

embedTopStickyId.description: [Functionality Configuration]: ID of element to be injected as a pinned content at top of chat

embedded.description: [Feature Flags]: Embed chat widget within a container element in the host page. Container element is configured with targetElement setting

embeddedVideo.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Embed YouTube video links in messages to be playable within chat widget

enableAgentSneakPreview.description: [Functionality Configuration]: A flag to control agent side sneak preview feature which lets the agent to see what the user is typing

enableAttachment.description: [Feature Flags]: Display share button in chat widget footer

enableAttachmentSecurity.description: [Feature Flags]: Enables sending security headers with attachment upload requests for client auth enable conversations

enableAutocompleteClientCache.description: [Feature Flags]: Enable autocomplete suggestions client caching

enableBotAudioResponse.description: [Feature Flags]: Utter skill's responses as they are received

enableClearMessage.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Display button on chat widget header to remove messages

enableDefaultClientResponse.description: [Feature Flags]: Provide default client response in case of delay in skill response

enableDraggableButton.description: [Functionality Configuration]: A flag to make the ODA Chat button draggable

enableEndConversation.description: [Functionality Configuration]: A flag to enable or disable the end conversation functionality

enableHeaderActionCollapse.description: [Feature Flags]: Collapses the header actions to a menu if the icon count is more than two

enableHeadless.description: [Feature Flags]: Create SDK instance without chat widget UI

enableLocalConversationHistory.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Load previous conversations for given userId if from storage of given browser

enableLongPolling.description: [Feature Flags]: Use http requests to connect to server as fallback if WebSocket fails to connect

enableSecureConnection.description: [Internal]: Configure TLS/SSL protocol for connection - https vs http and wss vs ws Some functionality like voice recognition is not available when it is set false

enableSendTypingStatus.description: [Functionality Configuration]: A flag to control sending of the user typing status

enableSpeech.description: [Feature Flags]: Enable voice recognition service to be able to send voice messages to skill

enableSpeechAutoSend.description: [Feature Flags]: Configure automatically sending voice recognized text message to skill without giving user control to modify or cancel it

enableTabsSync.description: [Feature Flags]: Enables synchronization of messages across tabs for the same userId and channelId combination

enableTimestamp.description: [Feature Flags]: Display delivery timestamps along each message

errorIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL of image shown alongside error messages

expandImageIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for image attachment expand icon button

fileIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL of image shown with file attachments

focusOnNewMessage.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Configures the element that is focused when a new skill message is received. If set 'action', on receiving a new skill message, the SDK sets focus on the first action button of the message if present. If no action button is present, the focus is set to user input field. If set 'input', the focus is always set to user input field when a new skill message is received.

font.description: [Layout Modification]: Font used for conversation in chat widget

fontFamily.description: [Layout Modification]: Font family used in the chat widget

fontSize.description: [Layout Modification]: Font size used in the chat widget

height.description: [Layout Modification]: Height of the chat widget

hotkeys.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Configures keyboard shortcuts to access widget UI elements directly without using mouse or touch

i18n.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Translation key-value fields for a specific locale, 'en' is provided as default

imageIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL of image shown with image attachments when the image can not be rendered

initBotAudioMuted.description: [Feature Flags]: Configure initialization of skill utterance in muted or unmuted state

initUserHiddenMessage.description: [Functionality Configuration]: User message sent to skill during initialization without being displayed in chat widget

initUserProfile.description: [Functionality Configuration]: User profile message sent to skill during initialization without being displayed in chat widget

isDebugMode.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Show logs for debugging the SDK

keyboardIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for keyboard input mode activation button icon

linkHandler.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Configuration object to process click events on links in messages

locale.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Locale used in chat widget for displaying text like placeholder, tooltip etc. The value set in locale does not apply to the conversation

logoIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for logo at chat widget header

messageCacheSizeLimit.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Maximum number of messages that can be saved in browser's localeStorage at a time

messagePadding.description: [Layout Modification]: Padding around messages in chat widget

micIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for voice recognition mode activation button icon

multiLangChat.description: [Feature Flags]: Language options to configure for multi-language chat feature

name.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Unique identifier for the instance. Used as prefix for the CSS classes applied to the component

openChatOnLoad.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Expand chat widget on initialization

openLinksInNewWindow.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Force open links in conversations in new window instead of following user's browser preference

personIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL for avatar icon shown alongside user messages

position.description: [Layout Modification]: Position of chat widget in host page

readMark.description: [Obsolete]: Symbol to indicate messages that are seen/read

reconnectInterval.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Time interval in seconds between a reconnection is attempted after a failure to connect to skill

reconnectMaxAttempts.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Maximum number of times a reconnection is attempted for a failure to connect to skill

sdkMetadata.description: [Internal]: SDK Metadata to send with each message

sendIcon.description: [Deprecated]: Image URL for send button icon

shareMenuItems.description: [Feature Flags]: Configures menu items shown in share popup

anyOf.description: A custom file share menu item

icon.description: Icon source for the share menu, file icon displayed by default

label.description: Share menu label, mandatory if translation string not provided in the i18n setting

maxSize.description: Maximum file size allowed in kilobytes, default and maximum size is 25MB (25 * 1024 KB)

type.description: Type of file format, '*' for all acceptable file types

showConnectionStatus.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Display connection status on chat widget header

showPrevConvStatus.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Display status message at the enf of older messages from previous conversations

showTypingIndicator.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Display indicator while waiting for skill's response

skillVoices.description: [Feature Flags]: Voice to be used to utter skill responses

speechLocale.description: [Feature Flags]: Locale in which voice message is sent for recognition

storageType.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Type of storage used in browser for chat messages

targetElement.description: [Feature Flags]: ID attribute of container element in which chat widget is embedded

timestampFormat.description: [Feature Flags]: Pattern to format message timestamps in default mode

timestampMode.description: [Feature Flags]: Type of timestamp to be displayed in conversation

ttsService.description: [Feature Flags]: Injects a custom speech synthesis service to be used for utterances

ttsVoice.description: [Feature Flags]: Voice to be used to utter skill responses

typingDelay.description: [Feature Flag]: Adds a typing effect to responses by adding a delay between display of text chunks

typingIndicatorTimeout.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Number of seconds after which typing indicator is automatically removed if no new response is received from skill

typingStatusInterval.description: [Functionality Configuration]: Interval in seconds to throttle the typing event and sending of the typing status

upgradeToWebSocketInterval.description: [Internal]: Time interval in seconds after which an attempt is made to upgrade to WebSocket connection during long polling based connection to skill

userId.description: [Network Configuration]: Unique identifier for user. SDK generates a random ID if not provided by the client

videoIcon.description: [Deprecated]: URL of image shown with video attachments when the video can not be rendered

webViewConfig.description: [Feature Flags]: Object to configure in-widget WebView

accessibilityTitle.description: Title label of WebView iframe for accessibility

closeButtonIcon.description: Image URL or SVG source string for the close button icon

closeButtonLabel.description: Label string for the close button

closeButtonType.description: Close button display type - as only icon, as only label, or with both

errorInfoBar.description: Flag to display or hide fallback error info snackbar in case the URL fails to load in WebView

errorInfoDismissLabel.description: Label for error info snackbar close button

errorInfoText.description: Informational text displayed in an error bar inside WebView as a fallback for the user in case the URL fails to load in the WebView

referrerPolicy.description: String value for WebView iframe's referrerpolicy attribute

sandbox.description: String array for WebView iframe's sandbox attribute

size.description: Relative size of the WebView compared to chat widget

width.description: [Layout Modification]: Width of the chat widget

SpeechSynthesisService.description: Interface for the speech synthesis service; this can be used to define a service that can be injected into the SDK to perform speech synthesis on behalf of the skill or assistant

SpeechSynthesisServiceVoice.description: Represents a voice that the SpeechSynthesisService supports. Every SpeechSynthesisServiceVoice has its own relative speech service including information about language, name and optionally more.

lang.description: Returns a BCP 47 language tag indicating the language of the voice

name.description: Returns a human-readable name that represents the voice

pitch.description: Pitch of the voice, can range between 0 and 2, default is 1

rate.description: Speed at which the utterance is spoken at, can range between 0.1 and 10, default is 1

volume.description: Volume at which the utterance is spoken at, can range between 0 and 1, default is 1

actions.description: List of actions related to the message that users can interact with

footerText.description: Optional footer text displayed after the main message

globalActions.description: List of actions that may have a global context and not entirely related to the message

headerText.description: Optional header text displayed before the main message

voice.description: Content to be used for voice description of the message
